title: KLAUS thiem, 55125 saarbruecken germany
text:
the rented car was in an exelent condition. your administration when collecting the car was outstanding good. the way you treat "small
wear and there scatches" is more than fair.
however, though you apologized finalily after a noumber of remindres, it was a bit frustrating in the end: my recommendation thus : kindly react to customers requests a little faster !!.
AND i still don`t understand your charges of A$ 45,oo for "dropping fees"
